name: Sacred Halo
content:
Sacred Halo

A circular temple complex where divine light forms a perfect halo above. Primary Objectives are light wells. Secondary markers are prayer circles or sacred altars. The air shimmers with holy energy.


Terrain Features:

  • Light wells
  • Prayer circles
  • Sacred altars
  • Divine light sources

Atmosphere:

The air is filled with the scent of incense and the soft glow of divine light. The ground is marked with sacred symbols, and the constant hum of prayer fills the air.
